definition: to come to an agreement/to complete negotiations
to persuade
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
variant of 說|说[shuo1]
to be fond of/to have a tendency to/to be prone to
good/well/proper/good to/easy to/very/so/(suffix indicating completion or readiness)/(of two people) close/on intimate terms/(after a personal pronoun) hello

sentences.english: Don't give me any lip service. I want to see some action!
sentences.chinese: 别对我说好听的，我要见你的行动。

sentences.english: Q30: Does reading have anything to do with my oral English?
sentences.chinese: 读书跟说好英文怎么会有关系？

sentences.english: I said yes agreeably , and hanged off.
sentences.chinese: 我欣然地说好的，然后就挂断了。

sentences.english: If we can speak English well,we will have more chance to succeed.
sentences.chinese: 如果我们能说好英语，我们就有更多的机会成功。

sentences.english: Why do you always speak evil things of me and not good?
sentences.chinese: 为什么你总是对我过不去，说恶不说好？

sentences.english: One day the president said yes, the next no.
sentences.chinese: 总统经常第一天说好，第二天又反悔。

sentences.english: I'm sure you can speak good English after finishing this book.
sentences.chinese: 我相信你学完这本书一定可以说好英语。

sentences.english: We said, only talk about love do not talk about love.
sentences.chinese: 我们说好，只谈喜欢不谈爱。

sentences.english: Being always clumsy when scolded, I always only come to an agreement as did. .
sentences.chinese: 有人骂老拙，老拙只说好。

sentences.english: Say forever, I do not know how to spread.
sentences.chinese: 羭说好永远的，不知怎么就散了。

sentences.english: If that promise is like the wind not tested.
sentences.chinese: 说好的承诺是否会像风一样经不起考验。

sentences.english: I waited for her cremains by the ashes furnace.
sentences.chinese: 骨灰出炉前我们和火化师父说好在炉前等。

sentences.english: Even if you don't Iike it?-No, of course not.
sentences.chinese: 就算是对你不喜欢的事情也说好？

sentences.english: And he told me I could go to the canteen to get paste, he had arranged well with the kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 临走时说，糨子到伙房去打，他已经跟炊事员说好了。

sentences.english: Her husband took her to her home, say, in her day.
sentences.chinese: 丈夫带着女儿去了婆婆家，说好，在婆家玩一天。

sentences.english: Okay, not to dare to eat the meal drink this cup of wine?
sentences.chinese: 好说好说，不尽力敢来吃这顿饭喝这杯酒吗？

definition: to say again/to put off a discussion until later/moreover/what's more/besides
to answer/to respond/to answer positively/to agree/to accept/to promise
to consult/to talk over/to discuss
anyway/in any case/to come over from the enemy's side
(coll.) all right?/OK?
hey!/(interjection used to attract attention or to express surprise or disapprobation)
sentence-final particle (abbr. for 呢啊[ne5 a5] or variant of 哪[na5])
battle cry
modal particle indicating that sth is obvious/particle indicating a pause for emphasis
it doesn't matter
to return/to go back
let it be/let it pass/forget about it
lit. to eat one's words/to break a promise/to go back on one's word/to renege/unsworn testimony
(phonetic)
to cough up/also pr. [ka3]
(final particle similar to 了[le5], indicating that sth is obvious)
(a groaning sound)
(nonverbal grunt as interjection)/OK, yeah/what?
interjection indicating approval, appreciation or agreement
God knows.../Who would have imagined...?
interjection or grunt of agreement/uhm/Ah, OK/expression of recognition/Oh, it's you!
modal particle ending sentence, showing affirmation, approval, or consent
interjection of surprise/Ah!/Oh!
interjection expressing doubt or requiring answer/Eh?/what?
interjection of surprise or doubt/Eh?/My!/what's up?
